#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
using namespace std  ;
struct data
{
    int one ;
    int two ;
    int three ;
    int five ;
};
int main()
{

    int n ; cin >> n ;
    struct data d[n+1] ;
    for(int i=0;i<=n;i++){d[i].one=0;d[i].two=0;d[i].three=0;d[i].five=0;}
    int arr[n+1] ;
    arr[0]=0;
    arr[1]=1;
    d[1].one =1 ;
    arr[2]=1;
    d[2].two=1;
    arr[3]=1;
    d[3].three=1;
    arr[4]=2;
    d[4].three=1 ;
    d[4].one = 1  ;
    arr[5]=1;
    d[5].five = 1 ;
    for(int i=6;i<=n;i++){
         //   cout << "Vikram" << endl ;
        arr[i] = min(min(1+arr[i-1],1+arr[i-2]),min(1+arr[i-3],1+arr[i-5]));
        if(arr[i] == 1+arr[i-5]){
                d[i].five=1+d[i-5].five;
                d[i].three = d[i-5].three;
                d[i].two = d[i-5].two ;
                d[i].one = d[i-5].one ;
                continue ;
        }
         if(arr[i] == 1+arr[i-3]){
            d[i].three=1+d[i-2].three ;

             d[i].five=d[i-2].five;
                d[i].two = d[i-2].two ;
                d[i].one = d[i-2].one ;
            continue ;
        }
         if(arr[i] == 1+ arr[i-2]){
            d[i].two=1+d[i-2].two ;
            d[i].three = d[i-2].three ;
            d[i].five = d[i-2].five ;
            d[i].one = d[i-2].one ;
            continue ;
        }
         if(arr[i] == 1 +arr[i-1]){
            d[i].one=1+d[i-1].one ;
            d[i].two = d[i].two;
            d[i].three = d[i].three ;
            d[i].five = d[i].five ;
            continue ;
        }
    }
    cout << d[n].five << endl ;
    cout << d[n].three << endl  ;
    cout << d[n].two << endl ;
    cout << d[n].one << endl ;
    return  0 ;
}
